Please provide a little more information to recreate this.  Where is the 
problem report you are clicking on?  in the Problems view I assume?

It's pretty simple to reproduce:
- Add an unused import to a java file in an Eclipse project
- Click on "The import ... is never used" in the Problems view, and drag 
  to the text editor
- check the .log file, an error will be there

I see this is M6 -- it doesn't show up in M3; I'm not sure which drop it first 
appeared in.

As of M7, I can no longer reproduce this problem (the problem view won't let me 
drag and drop into the Java editor -- which is fine with me).
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 55453 ***
